release.action: More robust loading of GNS country files, including old formats. Administration divisions are loaded too, making locations more useful.
Reports need to be pre-compiled from *.jrxml to *.jasper files. This reduces the library dependencies for Daylight Chart.
Updates to all third-party libraries to the latest versions, including reporting. Major internal code reorganization.
Export of JPEG charts now shows the right colors.
Print menu item is disabled in slim mode, since printing is done from the browser.
Recent locations list.
Created a new project for the parsing of GNIS files and GNS files.
Fixed reading of modified GNIS files and GNS files, since the file formats had changed.
Fixed reading of modified GNIS files and GNS files, since the file formats had changed.
Moved JasperReport definition to it's own XML file in the preferences directory.
New command line switch to specify the preferences directory.
Better error messages.
Better handling of file reading and writing, in UTF-8 format.
Fixed reading of modified GNIS files and GNS files, since the file formats had changed.
Moved all configuration to the .daylightchart directory in the user's home directory.
Added the ability to import and export (that is, customize) the report definition for PDF and HTML formats.
Added a new "slim" mode that shows the main user interface in an advanced mode.
The location dialog now allows you to change the time zone.
Fixed Unix launch.
Tweaked PDF and HTML export.
Changed copyright notices in the source.
Added the ability to save a daylight chart as an Adobe Acrobat PDF, or as a web page (HTML). These new formats have details on the twilight and sunrise and sunset times.
Smoothening of the charts, and spike removal.
Showing twilight times on the chart.
Chart legend.
Fixing gridlines on the chart.
Fixing months axis, so December shows.
Fixing reset all option. This option now closes the current window, and opens a new one, so that all tabs are closed, and all menus are reset.
Adding options for chart orientation.
Adding new command line option for a chart for a single location.
Adding new copy and paste actions for the locations list.
Fixing distribution.
Location editor to add, edit, and delete locations.
Icons and toolbars in the main window.
Charts are shown in tabs.
New Windows executable to launch daylight time.
Now remembers the locations sort order, and whether to use the time zone for the chart.
Now makes a best guess at the time zone for locations loaded in from GNS Country Files and GNIS Files.
New menu option to see online help.
New option to see daylight chart with local time.
Added new project.
New look and feel, courtesy of JGoodies Looks.
The ability in load in GNS Country Files.
The ability in load in GNIS Files.
